articles.content:

A North Dakota county commission that recently voted to limit the number of refugees it will accept may let voters decide the issue in the future.

articles.title: Man killed in shark attack off Western Australia state
articles.description: A man has been killed by a shark while diving near Esperance off the coast of Western Australia state
articles.content:
PERTH --

The attack happened as the man was diving from a boat at Cull Island off Esperance just after 1 p.m. His body has not been found.
